warezcdn.name: WataMote
warezcdn.title: Watashi ga motenai no wa dô kangaetemo omaera ga warui!

imdb.title: Watashi ga motenai no wa dô kangaetemo omaera ga warui!
imdb.plot: Kuroki Tomoko is a super popular female schoolgirl, with 50 years experience in dating and more than 100 boys - but just in the dating video games. In real life is a closed and shy person who comes within the definition of mojyo (...

episodes.title: Motenai shi, chotto imechen suru wa
episodes.plot: Oh, Tomoko. All she wants is just some attention. She tries so many times, but will she ever get a lucky break? She has trouble speaking at a food store.

episodes.title: Motenai shi, mukashi no tomodachi ni au
episodes.plot: Tomoko is to meet her best friend, Yuu. She advanced on to a different high school from Tomoko.

episodes.title: Motenai shi, akutenkô
episodes.plot: One stormy day, Tomoko attends school, but some unlucky events happen for her.

episodes.title: Motenai shi, chotto ii yume miru wa
episodes.plot: Tomoko tries to have an erotic dream, but only winds up having nightmares. On a train, she mistakenly thinks she is being molested. Tomoko ends up embarrassing herself by mistaking her newly bought panties as a handkerchief.

episodes.title: Motenai shi, sukiru appu shitemiru
episodes.plot: Tomoko thinks that most necessary for herself is "character setting". She tries to copy an animation character and a bargirl.

episodes.title: Motenai shi, hanabi ni iku
episodes.plot: The shadows beneath Tomoko's eyes seemed to have disappeared. Tomoko is convinced that she become much prettier because she has enjoyed Dating Sim everyday.

episodes.title: Motenai shi, natsuyasumi o makitsu suru
episodes.plot: Summer break is here, but Kuroki has no idea what to do. Later, she meets a male idol and has a few lines for him to say...

episodes.title: Motenaishi, mie o haru
episodes.plot: Tomoko grows anxious when she learns her cousin, Ki, is coming over, feeling she needs to look like a bitch in order to back up her tall tales. After a series of disappointing events, she starts to get a feeling of pity towards Tomoko.

episodes.title: Motenai shi, Natsu ga Owaru
episodes.plot: Kuroki's summer is almost over, but she still has time to work at a cake shop, reminisce about childhood, and take in a meteor shower.

episodes.title: Motenai shi, Ni-gakki ga Hajimaru
episodes.plot: The second school term begins and Tomoko is still unpopular, and she is relocated into the center of the class, making it harder for her to be alone. Tomoko contemplates starting her own club, but it is denied due to it being too vague.

episodes.title: Motenai shi, bunkasai ni sankasuru
episodes.plot: During the culture festival, Tomoko is unable to enjoy herself, but receives support from Megumi. The next day, Tomoko is visited by Yu. Noticing Tomoko feeling downhearted after Yu leaves, Megumi borrows a mascot costume to cheer her up.

episodes.title: Motenai shi, shôrai o kangaeru
episodes.plot: Kuroki is determined to make something of her school year, hatching one final plan to grab people's attention. Later, she summons up all her courage to talk to Imae-san, the student council president.

episodes.title: Motenai shi, Nazomeite miru
episodes.plot: Tomoko discusses her friends on how to make Watamote's 2nd season a success, only to be informed that it's highly unlikely. During middle school, Aomatsu had an encounter with a mysterious girl (Tomoko, playing around) on the rooftop.
